title: Long Gone Cat
description:
Librarian Note: The latest edition with updated cover of this title can be found HERE 
Secrets, lies, devastating loss, and old wounds ... insurmountable odds? Or, can love conquer all? Long Gone Cat is Katherine L. Evansâ€™ new contemporary romance, a thrilling tale that will keep you on the edge of your seat and turning the pages as you discover what fate has in store for star-crossed lovers, Cat and Alec. Long Gone Cat is a gripping tale of what happens when love collides with life. You will find yourself cheering for Cat, a very normal woman, despite a tragic past, with a secret talent that not only saves her life, but thrusts her into the limelight...a place she is learning to love. Alec is a struggling theater actor looking for his big break and trying to find the woman he lost and recover his life after years of self-doubt and alcoholism. Alec believes he and Cat will find their happily-ever-after if she can find forgiveness and let go of the past. Long Gone Cat is a story of two not-so-ordinary people who share an extraordinary friendship.It is a story of grief, loss, and the flawed ways we cope in the midst of tragic circumstances. It is a story of a woman who runs from her pain and a man who dances with his demons at the bottom of a bottle. It is a story of how we can fail at something ten thousand times, only to finally get it right on attempt number ten thousand and one. It is a story of the broken road to finding strength from within and learning to create your own happiness.But at its core, "Long Gone Cat" is a story of forgiveness and unconditional love.
author: Katherine L. Evans
